text: In the 2004–05 season, USM Alger competed in the Ligue 1 for the 25th time, as well as the Algerian Cup. It was their 10th consecutive season in the top flight of Algerian football. They were competing in Ligue 1, the CAF Champions League and the Algerian Cup. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 1 September 2004. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
